description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; profile of the head and shoulders of a woman with closed eyes turned to the left; area under closed eye on the right and lips colored in pink
inscription: LL in plate in reverse: Sonia | LR in plate: W.G. / 23 | LL in pencil, below image: 1 | LLC of sheet, in pencil: 71 | LL of sheet, in pencil: Privatexemplare / E.161 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: L-43 / 1876
portfolio: From Plate 7 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23 / S.
title: Tired Girl's Head (Sonia Gramatté), Plate 7 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
